title: An Act clarifying the wage act to protect hospital workers from being deprived of their wages

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Feeney, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1321) of Paul R. Feeney for legislation to clarify the wage act to protect hospital workers from being deprived of their wages.  Labor and Workforce Development.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Labor and Workforce Development

related_entities.name: committee on Labor and Workforce Development

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/28/2025 from 10:00 AM-02:00 PM in A-1
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Health Care Financing

related_entities.name: the committee on Health Care Financing

actions.description: Committee recommended ought to pass and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on Senate Ways and Means
committee on Senate Ways and Means
